summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LedgerOS personal accounting software. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working correctly, and end-to-end integration verified. Fixed one loan creation bug during testing.

fixed_during_testing.issue: TypeError: Loan() got multiple values for keyword argument 'ledger_id'
fixed_during_testing.fix_applied: Modified loan creation to avoid duplicate ledger_id parameter

passed_tests: Dashboard metrics display (net worth, balances, recent transactions)
Balance sheet and income/expense reports with charts
